ovdesc.p: Table to hold information about Event raised by Financial arrangement to raise commission in Agent arrangement

desc.p: Source of Error if any during processing online commission by Service
The activity that triggered the event on the financial arrangement. Should be valid record on AA.ACTIVITY
Represents if the function of the agent event. Can either be INPUT / REVERSE
Represents the status of the agent event. Can be NEW / PROCESSING / PROCESSED / ERROR
Represents if the event is for online or scheduled commission processing. Allowed values are SCHEDULED or ONLINE
Any overriding amount that was negotiated at the financial arrangement.
Any margins that was negotiated at the financial arrangement
If the event has to be re-tried this field should be set as Yes, the only option available.
The activity reference of commission processing activity that was triggered on the agent arrangement.
The linked agent arrangement on which commission should be processed. Should be a valid record on AA.ARRANGEMENT
Represents the amortization end date of an amortizable commission. This is updated only for online commissions
The financial arrangement that triggered the event. Should be a valid record in AA.ARRANGEMENT
Represents the amount on which commission needs to be calculated. Updated for both scheduled & online commissions
Represents the date from which the balance amount is applicable. Updated only in case of scheduled commissions.
Would be updated if the event has ended in an error. The error message that was encountered would be updated here.
